extensionDescription.message: Attempts switching backend servers based on HTTP header values. (eg X-SERVER)

refreshHostList.description: tooltip on image in page action

openSettings.description: tooltip on image in page action

lblOpt_HttpHeaders.message: Seek in following HTTP header names for hostname information. ( seperate multiple names with ; )

lblOpt_AmountSeekRequests.message: Launch requests seeking for other hostnames. (default 5)

lblOpt_MaxReloads.message: Maximum amount of reload attempts when switching to another host. (default 50)

lblOpt_ShowInCorner.message: Show hostname in the bottom right corner?

lblOpt_ReloadOtherTabs.message: Reload other tabs after host switching?
